title: Ticket #1672: LocalUserLog::logStarterError() called before initialized
description:
Igor observed the following: 

09/23 06:20:34 (pid:30260) ERROR "Assertion ERROR on (result)" at line 207 in file NTsenders.cpp
09/23 06:20:34 (pid:30260) ERROR "LocalUserLog::logStarterError(Assertion ERROR on (result)) called before init()" at line 222 in file local_user_log.cpp

The problem is that we are hitting an error before fetching the job from the shadow, so the local user log has not been initialized yet. The exception in logStarterError() just adds to the confusion.
check_ins:
2010-Sep-23 17:12   Check-in [25690]: Documented fix for LocalUserLog::logStarterError() exception. #1672 (By Dan Bradley )
2010-Sep-23 17:04   Check-in [19044]: Do not EXCEPT in LocalUserLog::logStarterError() if ulog not initialized. #1672 This is an expected code path. The EXCEPT here just makes the logs confusing. (By Dan Bradley )
creator: danb
